name: Data Miner
description:
Homage to Manic Miner. Demo in which you must escape from the Dark web recovering your stolen details along the way.

Use Left and Right cursor keys and Space (jump) to guide the miner around the levels  recovering your data from the hacker and escape through the connecting portal to the next level. Before finally escaping from the internet.

Known Bugs

  • Sometimes get stuck in platforms.
  • Spawn point changes places on Level 2.
